thread.title: Hands down, the best of the best. You'll have nothing to worry about!
thread.title_full: Hands down, the best of the best. You'll have nothing to worry about! - Review of Four Seasons Hotel George V Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: frou_frou_shanti
title: Hands down, the best of the best. You'll have nothing to worry about!
text:
Every time I visit Paris, this will be our "to-go" hotel. The prices may be unfriendly at times but it's worth every penny. We stayed at the Four Seasons Suite including breakfast. Staff were lovely, breakfast was amazing and room was perfect every single day. This really is the #1 luxury hotel.
Room Tip: best views no matter what room you choose See more room tips
